languages.text: {n}Фигура Висиря кренится под весом боевого облачения. Костлявые пальцы, дрожа, зачерпывают кровь из чаши и наносят на морщинистое лицо символы — знаки войны. Не отрываясь от ритуала, он произносит пустоте подле себя:{/n} "Нить за нитью, смерть за смертью, сплелась тропа подател{mf|я|ьницы} жизни. Да... я слышал. Дважды {mf|он|она} оказывал{mf|ся|ась} между нежизнью и несмертью. И дважды Неумирающий не принял {mf|его|ее}, ибо время еще не пришло".

{n}The figure of the Vizsier stoops under the weight of his battle garb. His bony fingers tremble as they scoop blood from the bowl and begin tracing the symbols of war on his withered face. Without breaking the ritual, he addresses the emptiness:{/n} "Thread after thread, death after death, the Giver of Life wove {mf|his|her} path. Yes... I have heard. Twice did {mf|he|she} find {mf|himself|herself} caught between undeath and unlife, and twice did the Undying One reject {mf|him|her}, for the time had not yet come."
languages.original_text: {n}Фигура Висиря кренится под весом боевого облачения. Костлявые пальцы, дрожа, зачерпывают кровь из чаши и наносят на морщинистое лицо символы — знаки войны. languages.text: {n}El visir se encorva bajo el peso de su indumentaria de combate. Sus huesudos dedos tiemblan al recoger sangre del cuenco y empezar a trazar los símbolos de la guerra en su marchito rostro. Sin interrumpir el ritual, se dirige al vacío:{/n} «Hilo tras hilo, muerte tras muerte, {mf|el Dador|la Dadora} de Vida ha tejido su camino. Sí... lo he oído. Dos veces atrapad{mf|o|a} entre la muerte en vida y la muerte, y ambas el Inmortal l{mf|o|a} rechazó, pues no había llegado su hora».
languages.original_text: {n}The figure of the Vizsier stoops under the weight of his battle garb. His bony fingers tremble as they scoop blood from the bowl and begin tracing the symbols of war on his withered face. Without breaking the ritual, he addresses the emptiness:{/n} "Thread after thread, death after death, the Giver of Life wove {mf|his|her} path. Yes... I have heard. Twice did {mf|he|she} find {mf|himself|herself} caught between undeath and unlife, and twice did the Undying One reject {mf|him|her}, for the time had not yet come."

Dos veces atrapad{mf|o|a} entre la muerte en vida y la muerte, y ambas el Inmortal l{mf|o|a} rechazó, pues no había llegado su hora».

languages.text: {n}ヴィジールは、戦闘服の重みに耐えられず前かがみになっている。その骨ばった指を震わせてボウルから血をすくい、くたびれた顔に描かれた戦争のシンボルをなぞった。儀式を中断することなく、男はヴォイドに語りかける。{/n}「糸から糸、死から死へと、命を与えし者は陛下の道を織る。あぁ…聞こえる。陛下は二度、不死と不生の狭間を彷徨っていることを自覚して、二度も不死の者が陛下を拒絶した。陛下のその時はまだ来ていないのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The figure of the Vizsier stoops under the weight of his battle garb. His bony fingers tremble as they scoop blood from the bowl and begin tracing the symbols of war on his withered face. Without breaking the ritual, he addresses the emptiness:{/n} "Thread after thread, death after death, the Giver of Life wove {mf|his|her} path. Yes... I have heard. Twice did {mf|he|she} find {mf|himself|herself} caught between undeath and unlife, and twice did the Undying One reject {mf|him|her}, for the time had not yet come."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィジールは、戦闘服の重みに耐えられず前かがみになっている。その骨ばった指を震わせてボウルから血をすくい、くたびれた顔に描かれた戦争のシンボルをなぞった。儀式を中断することなく、男はヴォイドに語りかける。{/n}「糸から糸、死から死へと、命を与えし者は陛下の道を織る。あぁ…聞こえる。陛下は二度、不死と不生の狭間を彷徨っていることを自覚して、二度も不死の者が陛下を拒絶した。陛下のその時はまだ来ていないのだ」

languages.text: {n}宿老身穿一袭战装，战装的重量压弯了他的腰。他瘦骨嶙峋的手指颤抖着，从碗里舀着血，在干瘪的脸上画着战争的面妆。他一边进行着仪式，一边对虚空开了口。{/n}“丝线连接丝线，死亡连接死亡。赐命者编织出了属于{mf|他|她}的道路。是啊……我已经听说了，{mf|他|她}已经两次身处不死与不生的状态之间。不死之神已经拒绝了{mf|他|她}两次，因为{mf|他|她}的最终时刻尚未到来。”
languages.original_text: {n}The figure of the Vizsier stoops under the weight of his battle garb. His bony fingers tremble as they scoop blood from the bowl and begin tracing the symbols of war on his withered face. Without breaking the ritual, he addresses the emptiness:{/n} "Thread after thread, death after death, the Giver of Life wove {mf|his|her} path. Yes... I have heard. Twice did {mf|he|she} find {mf|himself|herself} caught between undeath and unlife, and twice did the Undying One reject {mf|him|her}, for the time had not yet come."

languages.text: {n}Der Wesir wirkt unter dem Gewicht seiner Kampfausrüstung etwas gebeugt. Seine knochigen Finger zittern, als er Blut aus der Schale schöpft und sich damit die Symbole des Krieges auf das verwitterte Gesicht malt. Ohne das Ritual zu unterbrechen, spricht er in die Leere:{/n} "Faden um Faden, Tod um Tod hat {mf|der Lebensspender seinen|die Lebensspenderin ihren} Pfad gewebt. Ja ... Ich habe es vernommen. Zweimal fand {mf|er|sie} sich gefangen zwischen Untod und Unleben wieder, und zweimal hat der Todlose {mf|ihn|sie} zurückgewiesen, denn {mf|seine|ihre} Zeit war noch nicht gekommen gewesen."
languages.original_text: {n}The figure of the Vizsier stoops under the weight of his battle garb. His bony fingers tremble as they scoop blood from the bowl and begin tracing the symbols of war on his withered face. Without breaking the ritual, he addresses the emptiness:{/n} "Thread after thread, death after death, the Giver of Life wove {mf|his|her} path. Yes... I have heard. Twice did {mf|he|she} find {mf|himself|herself} caught between undeath and unlife, and twice did the Undying One reject {mf|him|her}, for the time had not yet come."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Wesir wirkt unter dem Gewicht seiner Kampfausrüstung etwas gebeugt. Seine knochigen Finger zittern, als er Blut aus der Schale schöpft und sich damit die Symbole des Krieges auf das verwitterte Gesicht malt. Ohne das Ritual zu unterbrechen, spricht er in die Leere:{/n} "Faden um Faden, Tod um Tod hat {mf|der Lebensspender seinen|die Lebensspenderin ihren} Pfad gewebt. Ja ... Ich habe es vernommen. Zweimal fand {mf|er|sie} sich gefangen zwischen Untod und Unleben wieder, und zweimal hat der Todlose {mf|ihn|sie} zurückgewiesen, denn {mf|seine|ihre} Zeit war noch nicht gekommen gewesen."

languages.text: {n}Le vizir semble écrasé par le poids de sa tenue de combat. Il plonge ses doigts décharnés et tremblants dans un bol rempli de sang et trace des symboles de guerre sur son visage flétri. Sans même interrompre le rituel, il s'adresse au vide :{/n} « Fil après fil, mort après mort, la Source de vie a tissé son chemin. Oui... J'ai entendu. Par deux fois, {mf|il|elle} s'est {mf|retrouvé|retrouvée} entre la vie et la mort, et par deux fois l'Immortel l'a {mf|rejeté|rejetée}, car son heure n'était pas encore venue. »
languages.original_text: {n}The figure of the Vizsier stoops under the weight of his battle garb. His bony fingers tremble as they scoop blood from the bowl and begin tracing the symbols of war on his withered face. Without breaking the ritual, he addresses the emptiness:{/n} "Thread after thread, death after death, the Giver of Life wove {mf|his|her} path. Yes... I have heard. Twice did {mf|he|she} find {mf|himself|herself} caught between undeath and unlife, and twice did the Undying One reject {mf|him|her}, for the time had not yet come."

Par deux fois, {mf|il|elle} s'est {mf|retrouvé|retrouvée} entre la vie et la mort, et par deux fois l'Immortel l'a {mf|rejeté|rejetée}, car son heure n'était pas encore venue. »

languages.text: {n}Vezir'in bedeni, savaş kıyafetinin ağırlığı altında kamburlaşıyor. Kemikli parmakları, çanaktaki kanı çekip alarak pörsümüş alnına savaş sembolleri çizerken titriyor. Ayine ara vermeden boşluğa hitap etmeye başlıyor.{/n} "Bir iplikten diğerine, bir ölümden diğerine geçerken Can Bahşeden sürekli yolunu dokur. Evet... Duydum. Tam iki kere kendini hortlaklık ve yaşamsızlık arasında sıkışıp kalmış bir hâlde buldu. Tam iki kere Ölmeyen onu reddetti. Çünkü onun vakti henüz gelmemişti."
languages.original_text: {n}The figure of the Vizsier stoops under the weight of his battle garb. His bony fingers tremble as they scoop blood from the bowl and begin tracing the symbols of war on his withered face. Without breaking the ritual, he addresses the emptiness:{/n} "Thread after thread, death after death, the Giver of Life wove {mf|his|her} path. Yes... I have heard.
